name: Clicker Kingdom
description:
INSTALL ON ANDROID OR WINDOWS FOR BEST EXPERIENCE!

Build your kingdom in this incremental game!

This is a casual incremental game where you will work to gain different types of resources! Resources can be used to purchase Units who will aid you in your resource production!

Unlock & cast multiple powerful spells to greatly boost your production!

Prestige your units & buildings for more boosts!

Production slow down? Rebirth! Rebirthing will grant you Gems, which will boost your production passively and can be used for more powerful upgrades!
